name: Easy Mode
description:
LUDUM DARE 47 SUBMISSION

*GAMEPAD HIGHLY RECOMMENDED*

Fight through a sentient planet as it adapts to your skill as you loop through the same level over and over. It is always the same map, but the terrain and placement of enemies and items is altered to create a greater challenge.

Playtime: Normal 5-10 minutes. Speedrun - My best is 2:44:03. I’m sure someone can blow that out of the water.

MAJOR SELLING POINTS:

  • You can destroy bullets by punching them.
  • Killing enemies will refill health.
  • You can ignore the princess at the end.
  • Destroy the difficulty button to activate speed run mode (shows timer on level)

NOTE This is not a rage game. The enemies and obstacles are crazy, but your hero is crazy too. Game will be beatable without dying.
